Load all packages, and data sets for use in week

```{r message = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggthemes)
library(faraway)
library(dlnm)
data("chicagoNMMAPS")
data("worldcup")
```
Converting the worldcup data to a tibble, and adding Player column.
```{r}
worldcup <- worldcup %>%
  tibble::rownames_to_column(var = "Player")
head(worldcup, 2)
```
Defining top player
```{r}
top_player <- worldcup %>% 
  top_n(n = 1, wt = Shots)
```
Cleaning data and graphing
```{r fig.width=10, fig.height=10}
worldcup %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Time, y = Shots, color = Team)) +
  theme_tufte() +
  labs(x = "Time (seconds)", y = "The Number of shots by each player", 
       color = "Team") +
  geom_point(size = 0.8, alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 270, linetype = 2) 
```
